channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2023120619
item.description:
Report X-2023120619

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-06
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package placed in plastic bin to contain leakage. Placed under fume hood. DescribePack: Leakage from the bottom of the jerrican. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in plastic bin.

item.title: Report X-2023120896
item.description:
Report X-2023120896

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-02T15:11:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-14
  • City: CHICOPEE
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box was in trailer being unloaded. Sort manager Evan and Operations manager Manny identified leaking hazmat box in trailer. Box was immediately placed in black plastic tote with clear plastic bag. Box and plastic tote were brought to QA. Leak was contained by fibreboard box. Box identified as hazmat by QA staff. DescribePack: Box was opened and loose caps on all four gallon bottles of ethanol were identified and tightened. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: Caps were tightened on bottles to prevent further leaking

item.title: Report I-2023090104
item.description:
Report I-2023090104

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-05T00:33:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: LOWELL
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: TRIUMVIRATE ENVIRONMENTAL, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A Sharp object punctured the container, leaving a small hole on the bottom of the container. Some material was absorbed into the pallet and puddled on the floor. Approximately 4 gallons were released.
